name: NASTY FUTURE SPACEDEATH
description:
A pretty basic single-stage shmup. Developed in a couple hours at a party one night because I was feeling particularly anxious and wanted to put my energy somewhere else. Just a cute little thing, nothing fancy. Originally compiled as a SWF and website but was later re-exported as an EXE. For some reason, like HARPY!SIREN!, the score font is wack and not loading properly.

last modified 2012.12.21
